name: Dubai Financial Services Authority (DFSA)
description: The DFSA is the independent regulator of financial and ancillary services conducted in or from the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC). It oversees firms offering wholesale trading, retail FX and CFD services, asset management, and advisory activities, ensuring compliance with international best practices.

brokerRequirements.requirement: Local Presence: Physical office + senior management in Dubai
Compliance Architecture: AML/fraud systems audited by DFSA-recognized firms

bottomline: The DFSA has crafted a regulatory ecosystem where forex brokers access deep liquidity pools safely, and traders gain institutional-grade protections. As the 2025 reforms take root, Dubai isn’t just competing with London or Singapore—it’s redefining what a truly modern forex marketplace should be.
